document_data.caption: ''The Farlong house, before the Second War of the Shadow.''
document_data.name: Farlong house
document_data.mainbody: The '''Farlong house''' was one of the houses in the village of [[West Harbor]] on the [[Sword Coast North]]. It belonged to [[Daeghun Farlong]].
document_data.Location: The house was located beyond the river, north of the center of the village. There was a bridge that connected to the center, but that bridge was later destroyed.
document_data.Structure: The house was wooden, like the other houses of West Harbor.
document_data.Interior: The house was composed of two levels: the first had a hall and a fireplace, while the other had two bedrooms, for Daeghun and his [[Kalach-Cha|foster child]].
document_data.History: This was the house where Daeghun and the Kalach-Cha lived. When the two escaped West Harbor following the [[Second War of the Shadow]] in [[1374 DR]], the house was destroyed when [[Ammon Jerro]] and his [[demon]]s passed through the village.
document_data.Rumors and legends: It was here that the Kalach-Cha lived through their childhood.
